title: raamaa raamaa raamaa maampaahi
sahitya:
rAma rAma rAma mAm pAhi

caraNam 1

 vanamuna jani muni jana gaNamunu ganu goni nenaruna ghanamuna pAlincina
   
caraNam 2

 vanaja nayana ninu manasuna dina dina munu kanugona nanu nanakhuni sEyavE
   
caraNam 3

 sura naravara nuta caraNa kamala yuga kara dhrta girivara aravara sEyaka
   
caraNam 4

 murakhara hara paricara karuNAkara dharanuta karivarada varada
   
caraNam 5

 sharaNukoNTi niratamunanu ninu hrt-sarasijamunu virulanu pUjintunu
   
caraNam 6

 kali yugamuna nelakona itavale vipuDula gani ninugA madini bhajintunu
   
caraNam 7

 bahu vacanamulenduku ika nIvE iha paramulu mari nA sarvasvamu
   
caraNam 8

 sarasija bhava surapati vandita pada puraharanuta pAlita tyAgarAja
